pullRequest.title: First party data support for auction

commit.message:
Revert "Revert First Party Data bidderconfig (#769)"

This reverts commit 6462c3fd7e097cb152858932141514ccb15b09c9.
Adjust FPD processing according to updated requirements

nodes.bodyText: I am not sure if it is possible that pfdUser from bidderConfig can contain not fpd fields, but simple merge will override non fpd fields, that is not expected behavior.  I propose to replace only fpd fields  one by one.

commit.message: Switch to FpdResolver to merge FPD attributes during auction
